events.description: Mkapa's government faced economic challenges and focused on stabilizing the economy, restoring donor confidence, and implementing neo-liberal market policies.
supporting_quotes: Mkapa’s government initially faced a gloomy economic position.
The first main challenge for Mkapa was to enhance the discipline in state finances and stabilise the economy.
Having agreed to implement proposals endorsed by donors, Mkapa quickly won international trust.

      ]
